verbs.description: immigrant girl only memory of [ARG1: america] rodrigo [V: soberanes] san juan ixcoy guatemala — with an impish smile 5-year old filomena draws up her right hand and fashions herself into a cattle driver she designates her three - year old cousin the unenviable role of bull the bull that going to the united states filomena proclaims in spanish directing her cousin - turned - bull through the family one - room floorless wooden hut it unclear whether she thinks the u s is a promised land or nazario mexico new york city border patrol claudia samayoa united states guatemala washington post filomena president donald trump america
